summary: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.
cast: John Cusack|Ray Liotta|Amanda Peet|John Hawkes|Alfred Molina|Clea DuVall|John C. McGinley|William Lee Scott|Jake Busey|Pruitt Taylor Vince|Rebecca De Mornay|Carmen Argenziano|Marshall Bell|Leila Kenzle|Matt Letscher|Bret Loehr|Holmes Osborne|Frederick Coffin|Joe Hart|Michael Hirsch|Terence Bernie Hines|Stuart M. Besser
title: Identidad
